mapper.sql: select u.org_code,u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.user_type, u.email, u.unit_name, u.avatar, u.phone_number, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status as dept_status , r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select: select u.org_code,u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.user_type, u.email, u.unit_name, u.avatar, u.phone_number, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, a.province AS province, a.city AS city, a.area AS area, a.address AS address from sys_user u left join t_address a on u.user_id = a.customer_user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
select count(1) from sys_user where user_name = #{userName} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select user_id, phone_number from sys_user where phone_number = #{phonenumber} limit 1
select user_id, email from sys_user where email = #{email} limit 1
